item.Q:

item.A:
lì

item.Q:
Write the character:
to do; to manage; to handle; to go about; to run; to set up; to deal with
item.A:
traditional: 辦
bàn
办法 (辦法) bànfǎ means; method; way (of doing sth)

item.Q:

always; to assemble; gather; total; overall; head; chief; general; in every case
item.A:
traditional: 總
zǒng

item.Q:

item.A:
wèi
未知数 (未知數) wèizhīshù unknown quantity

item.Q:
Write the character:

2: surname; great-grand (father)
item.A:
曾 (strokes unavailable)
1: céng 2: zēng

traditional: 參
1: cān 2: shēn
